name: Bowman Simulator: Birds Hunting Master
description:
Tense the string of your super bow and be ready to shoot birds from far distances! Hold your breath, aim carefully and shoot the arrow! Improve your skills hunting different birds and have fun playing Bowman Simulator: Birds Hunting Master!

Ever dreamed about leveling up your animal or bird hunting skills? Then this awesome archery shooting game is made exactly for you! Be the first class with your awesome bow or crossbow! Train your skills and hit every birdy target quickly and in cool blood! Choose your marksman’s weapon and make the top ten! Your mission is to kill all birds really accurate and with a limited number of arrows!

Become the best hunter ever shooting birds and mastering your marksman’ skills with every great shot!
Every bird flies with different speed and at different heights, so be wise, think ahead and choose proper weapon for every kind of this bird mission! Shoot birds during their flight as fast as it even possible at short time and unlock new difficult and interesting missions!

Earn points for successfully done missions and buy new interesting locations, weapons or ever missions! Try to shoot birds like pigeon, seagull, wild duck or even mighty eagles and become the real champion of hunters! Upgrade your skills to the perfection level and have fun! Choose your bow and get ready to the collect all awards in Bowman Simulator: Birds Hunting Master!

Bowman Simulator: Birds Hunting Master features:
• Ultimate archery hunting simulator
• Wide range of different birds
• Interesting locations with various missions
• Realistic 3D graphics


Prove that you’re worth the fame of the most popular and exact hunters and marksmen! Do your best and enjoy Bowman Simulator: Birds Hunting Master!
